name: TwitchVines
description: Twitch integration for vinesauce.com website. It makes most thing that were light more dark, and it also makes most ot the buttons blue, rather that purple.
additional_info:
for better integration, you may want to edit the style and add this line:

@import url(http://fonts.googleapis.com/css?family=Open+Sans:400,600,700,800);
